Author: Simple858
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: Wait for DEV to make Announctment. Here are the latest news from Bitpark:  Invited users within Japan are currently experiencing the alpha version of our service; Our objective for this release was to receive feedback from invited users within Japan during a limited-time release period. This release also gave us the chance to explain to others the kind of service we hope to provide to users. In doing so, we were able to garner feedback regarding the platform we strive to become.  Through engaging in the alpha version release, we have receive praised for our service — users tell us that the insurance platform we aim to create promises to provide many benefits for customers. We also received feedback regarding the service provision stage that will allow us to make improvements to the service moving forward.  By commencing with this alpha version release, we have attained better clarity as to what kind of insurance platform we should provide to our users. As we proceed forward with development of an upgraded version, we will take all of these suggestions and ideas into special consideration.   Although we are running behind schedule, we are also in the midst of negotiating with several coin exchange platforms to host our original currency. We will make an announcement as soon as negotiations have been completed.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th

It caused problems, but the problems are gone now that they've changed their ticker to BPC.  And Bitpark Coin did a good job of promptly taking care of it.  I'll mention this on my radio show tonight.  Best of luck with Bitpark Coin.  MWD BipCoin

Author: MWD64
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: The ticker symbol "BIP" is taken   BIP is used by our coin BipCoin which was released Aug 20, 2016: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1592050.0  The first 3 letters of every BipCoin address are BIP.  We're already on an exchange (Cryptopia) as BIP.  We're listed on  BipCoin was written up in CoinTelegraph this week: https://cointelegraph.com/news/bipcoin-to-provide-censorship-proof-dns-succeed-where-namecoin-failed  BipCoin is an active coin with active development.  We're already on coinmarketcap.com as BIP: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bipcoin/  The first time I see you using "BIP" is November 9th, 2016: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1575177.msg16828194#msg16828194  I STRONGLY suggest you change your symbol from BIP to something else, while it's still easy and non-embarrassing to do so.   I'd suggest maybe BPC which is not taken according to a quick search on https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/views/all/ coinmarketcap. (Surprising that you didn't search there before deciding on "BIP.")  I wish you you and your coin well. But it's going to be a constant hassle for you and for us if you don't change it. Including that you may lose business from people buying our coin when they think they're buying your coin.  I think this is something that people investing in your ICO would not be happy with.  I know you are on at least one exchange, LiveCoin, but they would probably change it if you ask them now before there's a lot of volume.  Please let me know what you decide to to.   Take care, MWD, BipCoin Dev team.

Author: MWD64
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: I see your answer is simply the date of the ICO announcement. But that's not the date you are started using the symbol BIP. It wasn't on this thread until November. And as far as I can tell it wasn't used in commerce anywhere until you got listed on livecoin. That started this month, didn't it?  You still aren't listed on https://coinmarketcap.com/ which is commonly considered the "first use in commerce" for cryptos ticker symbols. The also won't list two coins with the same symbol.  My request isn't a "YOU MUST STOP USING THIS SYMBOL." I can't make you do that. It's much more "You'd be crazy to keep using this symbol, and it will work against you, not for you, to not change it now before you use your symbol a lot more places."  So is your answer that you are on the team of this coin and that you refuse to consider changing it? I'd love it if you're clear in your reply. A date is not a clear reply.

Author: MWD64
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: I'm surprised there are investors who want to respond. I finally read this whole thread. Last two or 3 pages seem to be largely people who invested money saying they never got their token, and that the dev team is no longer responding to their emails.

Author: lm1369
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: Here there is a great problem with the pools. I have mined xmr and it pays to me a day what the calculators mark. I mining bipcoin I have left it several times because I do not see that the payments are consistent with the calculators, almost always it is the half. For example today, that it started paying well and then that the difficulty raised, it stops doing. With my speed, it has to pay me 1.25 Bip per hour at this moment but there is a payment that was late almost 8 hours and was 5.2 Bip  http://i68.tinypic.com/r9kkfd.jpg

Author: MWD64
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: This is not the BipCoin tread.  This is the tread of Bitpark Coin, a totally irresponsible coin that fucked up BipCoin and probably no one will ever list Bitpark Coin on an exchange again. Because Bitpark Coin were sloppy and picked a ticker symbol (BIP) that was already in use by another coin (BipCoin). BipCoin is a known coin, and has been already being mined and sold and bought for months. Bitpark Coin didn't bother checking. It takes 2 minutes to check. Now people are buying one coin thinking they're buying another.  I got it taken care off, alerted all exchanges about it, and listing places, but it's still incorrectly listed one place. Hopefully that will change soon.  I spent most of my whole Christmas dealing with bullshit fallout from Bitpark Coin's flaky bullshit. Should have been with my family, but instead was minimizing damage done by a coin that seems like it's run by 8 year olds.   Here's the thread for our coin, BipCoin. The page I'm linking to is more detail about Bitpark Coin's huge fuck up. But yeah this is the thread where posting should get an answer. Thanks! https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1720595.msg17307807#msg17307807  Before you do though, I'm curious, can you tell me how you ended up posting here? Feel free to post it here. Bitcoin Park deserve to deal with off-topic posts since they've effectively made my coin an off-topic COIN some places where we already were. And they MAY HAVE MADE IT HARDER FOR BipCoin TO GET LISTED ON OTHER EXCHANGES.

Author: MWD64
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: I'm not going to sue Bitcoin Park, but I'd probably have a good case, with the damage they caused by stealing our ticker symbol and getting their coin listed as my coin on some of the same places we're listed.  And I can't submit to any exchanges or press or anything until this is fixed, because I'll have to explain it, which will complicate things with whoever I'm submitting our coin to.  We're in the middle of a fundraiser for our Dot-Bip plans. If we don't reach our goal now, we'll always wonder if this had something to do with it, since some people already think WE did something sleazy because of our coin feeding from ticker of another coin now on many services, when we actually did nothing at all.  If Bitcoin Park were smart, they'd immediately change their ticker symbol, then offer me some BTC for the hassle they've caused me, just to slightly restore faith in their coin. But I don't think they're smart, because they are not responding to emails from me. Or from their investors, according to some posts on this thread.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: BITPARK Token distribution date has changed from November 1 to November 9.  There is still some effect to Ethereum network starting last month. Therefore we have been observing the situation by test sending/receiving Tokens among synchronized multiple platforms. Starting today we are test sending BITPARK Token (BIP) to your registered BITPARK Token (BIP).  Please confirm with your Wallet.  Once you made sure of receiving 0.0001 BIP, open the browser about2ndico page. Press the button of "Request The BITPARK Tokens.

Author: bitpark_
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: B I T P A R K  ICO website: https://ico.bitpark.net WebSite: https://bitpark.net   --- THIS SERVICE ---  New P2P Insurance Platform We will aim for a new insurance service with P2P Insurance and Cryptocurrency.  Mujin Community Like the old Japanese mutual aid society, MUJIN, we will offer a place where Cryptocurrency and community interact.  P2P Insurance We will aim for a new insurance service with P2P Insurance and Cryptocurrency. A platform with transparency that never over-charges will be provided.   A world of insurance expands with Cryptocurrency. Gathering everyone’s money and making use of it, now that is the spirit of mutual help. Plans where helping one another by distributing burden and responsibility to every-one have existed for many generations. For example, insurance, mutual aid societies, crowd funding by friends, etc., these large and small mutual support plans take place among friends and family, acquaintances, and people sharing common worries.  In the traditional way of things, coordinating group of people and money has many ob-stacles. SNS etc. has come to the scene, and communication has evolved, but fiat cur-rencies differ by countries and, in reality a bank account can’t easily be managed col-lectively.  We are trying to create a comprehensive platform for people to gather money among each other and manage it, with the power of cryptocurrency and its underlying technol-ogies.  Mutual help = insurance (almost), so we call BITPARK an “P2P insurance platform.”   Cryptocurrency The Wallet handles bitcoins, but for Mujin and insurance, BITPARK tokens will be used. BITPARK tokens is issued on Ethereum(ETH) blockchain. This is token to be used from the time of official release.  Types of insurance We limit it to small payoff and short-term insurance, making the platform available for casual use.  Community In groups, Mujin or insurance, there is always a community for each. Wallet and com-munication functions are all in one.  P2P Lendings By rating groups and individuals, one can receive discounts in insurance fees and quali-fy for small amount loans.  Collective management All participants can view the balance and transaction history. For security, funds can only be sent to participants, and multiple participants need to sign in order for payment to be sent.  Asset management For tokens gathered by Mujin or insurance, we will provide functions to store and asset-manage in local currencies.   --- ICO PLAN ---  ICO website: https://ico.bitpark.net WebSite: https://bitpark.net  ICO 1st July 25th until August 15th 5 million token will be distributed to ICO participants.  ICO 2st September 5th until October 15th 70 million token will be distributed to ICO participants.   --- ICO STRUCTURE ---  The total token supply is 100 milllion.  1st Phase: 5 million token will be distributed to ICO participants. 2st Phase: 70 million token will be distributed to ICO participants.  20 million tokens will be reserved as financial incentive for founding members, strategic partners and dev team. 5 million tokens will be reserved for service users instant buying.  --- INVEST ---  ICO 1st The first 400 users will receive 50% bonus to their sent BTC. Next 401 to 1200 users will receive 20% bonus to their sent BTC.  - It uses the multi-sig for maximum security. - The minimum amount of BITCOIN in the ICO 1st does not have. - This time, we don't have referral program.  ICO 2st 2nd ICO's BITPARK token price: 15%+ to ICO 1st rate - We will offering the amount, which is 15%+ to fixed rate after ICO 1st.     ICO Bonuses for early participation    1st week bonus:   10% bonus 2nd week bonus:   5% bonus Last DAY bonus:   5% bonus  - We have Bounty campaign. Planing signature bounty.  - After ICO 2st finished, BITPARK token will be tradable.   --- ROADMAP ---  Progress to date : https://bitpark.net/blog.html  Group Wallet Development of bitcoin wallet and group wallet.  Mujin Community Coin and community coordination function with which one can create groups with same hobbies etc will be developed.  P2P Insurance Development of a platform with insurance function.   --- THE TEAM ---  Hidenari Aizawa co-founder After being CTO for a company, I went independent. I managed a development company for over 10 years. In system development, I often acts as a producer who oversees planning of the service, development and operation. Since January 2016, I started to draw up the vision of BITPARK service, and is now in charge of design of service and development.  Takaho Hatanaka co-founder I has been working as chief engineer and system consultant. The experience I has is diverse, ranging from embedded systems to game apps. My favorite languages are C++ and PHP, and I excels in large-scale web system development and infrastructure construction. I has been developing BITPARK service since February 2-16.   --- LINKS ---  Website: https://bitpark.net ICO WEB: https://ico.bitpark.net Twitter: https://twitter.com/BITPARK_

Author: bitpark_
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: Hi,  Thanks to your opinion.  This is our first time ICO, so there was strange point at ICO plan. But, we are wishing to serve advantageous terms to ICO users. And, we makes you misunderstood. We haven't started distribution of BITPARK token to users yet.  Mujin Community is name of one of the BITPARK service function. We reserved 45 million tokens for service users instant buying.  But, the ratio of this time ICO's distributing tokens was not nice. So, we will change the number of token which will be distribute at 2nd ICO.  Instant buying is an function to shortcut time and effort, more than buying at outside exchange. It will be expensive than market price, but we will prepare to make buying much more easier. Token for buying instant will be procure from token market, if we decreases to overall 5 million and token won't be enough.

Author: OCTOPARTY
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: I have participated in the ICO. I didn't throw too much at it, but figured may as well throw some btc down for the extra 50%.  I do have some questions though:  1. What is the reason for holding 2 ICO sales? 2. How much are you looking to raise in the ICOs? 3. What markets are you looking to add Bitpark to first? Smaller exchanges or are you shooting for Bittrex or Poloniex right away? 4. It doesn't look like the first ICO has too much traction. What is the advantage of people participating in the first ICO versus the second ICO sale later?  Thanks!  Edit: Never mind on some of the questions. I see the advantage is the 50% bonus and the cheaper price is for the first phase of the ICO.

Author: legendbtc
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th

Author: regexlove
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITPARK - New P2P Insurance Platform, ICO 1st untill August 15th
Body: Interesting goals!  But ICO has a logic error, you can't have both:  Fixed amount of coins distributed per ICO round  +  Fixed amount of discount per ICO round.
